text: It's the first bus stop into the Tiong Bahru area. It's near a number of seafood restaurants and the Link Hotel across the road. But that said, there's no shelter towards anywhere, and that could be a problem. You'd still need to bring your umbrella if you're travelling anywhere. It's a large enough bus stop to hide from the rain though.
This bus stop have upgraded in this 2024
This area is surrounded by variety of restaurants and bakery shops. There is a wet market just near to this location which is mostly crowded in the mornings.
Bus 75 routes seem to draw wrongly on the map
